QuestData.Title: Another Way
QuestData.Description:
Well, the bridge option is out. You still got that grapple launcher handy?
It looks like we can get across from the top of that tower over there. First thing's first, though, we'll need to deal with the big ugly sitting out front.
You take point.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Gunnlaug Scaleheart in Hrydshal, then climb to the top of the tower.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, we made it this far...
QuestData.RewardText: Well, there's no stopping you, is there?
